rules_text:
Children of the Void has hexproof as long as it's your turn.
Children of the Void can't attack or block unless you reappropriate [i](exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard)[/i].
flavor_text:
[i]“Lovi can't fill everything. The empty spaces now sire something new. Scared. Starving.”
—Vakavanha, Who Sees Anew[/i]
